T02D2245:134b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2245:134b-5: spros pa med cing bla na med //
T02D2245:134b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal //
T02D2245:134b-7: mdor bsdus slob mas rtogs bya'i phyir //
T02D2245:134b-8: rnam pa lnga ni bdag gis bshad //
T02D2245:134b-9: aom a'a:h'um zhes pa 'dis bdag dang gnas dang rnal 'byor bsrungs bar byas la //
T02D2245:134b-10: dri zhim po la sogs pas byugs pa'i sa'i cha
T02D2245:134b-11: grub bzhi pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
T02D2245:134b-12: su // de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang //
T02D2245:134b-13: rnal 'byor ma lnga rnams mchod de //
T02D2245:134b-14: de la dbus su kha dog sna tshogs pa'i bam
T02D2245:134b-15: yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs padma 'dab ma
T02D2245:134b-16: brgyad pa kha bye ba'i lte ba'i steng du ram
T02D2245:134b-17: dmar po yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D2245:134b-18: 'khor la gnas pa'i h'um sngon po las mi bskyod
T02D2245:134b-19: ba zhal gcig phyag gnyis pas gnon gyi phyag rgya
T02D2245:134b-20: mdzad pa // rdo rje'i skyil krung bcas pa /
T02D2245:134b-21: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po
T02D2245:134b-22: brgyad cus brgyan pa'i sku stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs
T02D2245:134b-23: pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyi gnas
T02D2245:134b-24: bu ga dang sha dang rus pa spangs pa /
T02D2245:134b-25: rab tu snang ba tsam ste me long gi gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa /
T02D2245:134b-26: bden pa ma yin brdzun pa ma yin pa /
T02D2245:135a-1: pa chen po'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir kha dog nag po //
T02D2245:135a-2: rdo rje nag po'i phyag mtshan can chos kyi dbyings
T02D2245:135a-3: rnam par dag pa phung po lnga'i rang bzhin te
T02D2245:135a-4: / skra dang kha sbu bregs pa chos gos gyon pa'i sku //
T02D2245:135a-5: spyi bor rdo rje sems dpas mtshan pa //
T02D2245:135a-6: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'o //
T02D2245:135a-7: de nyid rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid rnam pa
T02D2245:135a-8: thams cad mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi
T02D2245:135a-10: de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir chos kyi sku'o //
T02D2245:135a-11: rab tu snang ba tsam yin pa'i phyir langs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D2245:135a-12: brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir sbrul pa'i sku'o //
T02D2245:135a-14: 'dus ma byas sems chos kyi sku //
T02D2245:135a-15: rtag pa longs spyod rdzogs mtshan nyid //
T02D2245:135a-16: sna tshogs de nyid sbrul pa'o //
T02D2245:135a-17: gnyug ma kun gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2245:135a-19: rnam par rtog pa la sogs pas mi rig pa'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs can dang //
T02D2245:135a-20: rdo rje'i rigs de 'jig rten pa rnams kyis mi rig pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2245:135a-28: sgra dang tsa'i sde tshan te /
T02D2245:135a-29: 'di dag ni mi bskyod pa'i rnam par dag pa //
T02D2245:135a-30: phyi rol dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi rnam par gzhag pa'o //
T02D2245:135a-31: 'dir yang sku bzhi'i rnam par gzhag pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2245:135a-34: rdo rje sems dpa' yang h'um las skyes pa dkar
T02D2245:135a-35: po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rdo rje dril bu
T02D2245:135a-39: ston ka'i dus rnam par dag pa /
T02D2245:135a-40: ya ra la wa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid nam phyed nas nam langs pa'i bar te /
T02D2245:135a-41: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ming gzhan no //
T02D2245:135a-42: shar gyi 'dab ma la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
T02D2245:135a-43: aom las skyes pa'i rnam par snang mdzad mdog dkar bo 'khor lo dkar po'i phyag mtshan dang /
T02D2245:135a-44: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can /
T02D2245:135a-45: gzugs kyi phung po rang bzhin dang /
T02D2245:135b-0: gti mug gi lus kyi rang bzhin @135b dang ;
T02D2245:135b-1: bshad pa'i rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D2245:135b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs can dang /
T02D2245:135b-3: me long lta bu'i ye shes rab tu gnas pa dang /
T02D2245:135b-4: dgun gyi dus rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D2245:135b-7: snga dro'i thun gyi bdag nyid dang /
T02D2245:135b-9: aom a'a:dzi na dzi ka h'um zhes bya ba 'di ni sngags so //
T02D2245:135b-10: lho'i 'dab ma'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D2245:135b-11: tr'am las skyes pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan kha dog
T02D2245:135b-12: ser po rin po che'i phyag mtshan dang /
T02D2245:135b-13: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa /
T02D2245:135b-14: tshor ba'i phung po'i rang bzhin dang phra ma'i lus dang /
T02D2245:135b-15: khrag gi bdag nyid rin po che'i rigs /
T02D2245:135b-16: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa /
T02D2245:135b-17: dpyid kyi dus rnam par dag pa /
T02D2245:135b-18: lan tshva'i lus kyi rang bzhin /
T02D2245:135b-19: ta'i sde tshan gyis khyab pa thun tshod gsum pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2245:135b-20: 'di'i sngags ni aom a'a:ratna dhrik h'um zhes pa'o //
T02D2245:135b-21: de'i nub kyi 'dab ma la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2245:135b-22: gyi steng du hr'i:dmar po las yang dag par byung
T02D2245:135b-23: ba'i 'od dpag med kha dog dmar po padma'i phyag
T02D2245:135b-24: mtshan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa //
T02D2245:135b-25: 'du shes kyi phung po'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D2245:135b-29: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D2245:135b-30: sos ka'i dus kyi rang bzhin dang ro skyur ba'i lus //
T02D2245:135b-31: ta'i sde tshan gyi bdag nyid do //
T02D2245:135b-34: aom a'a:aa ro li ka h'um zhes pa'o //
T02D2245:135b-35: de'i byang gi 'dab ma la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2245:135b-36: gyi steng du kham ljang gu las skyes pa'i don
T02D2245:135b-38: sha'i rang bzhin ral gri'i phyag mtshan dang /
T02D2245:135b-40: 'du byed kyi phung po'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D2245:135b-42: phrag dog gi rang bzhin bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang /
T02D2245:135b-43: char gyi dus kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D2245:135b-45: pa'i sde tshan gyi rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D2245:135b-46: nam phyed kyi dus bzhin no //
T02D2245:135b-48: aom a'a:pradzny'a dhrik h'um zhes pa'o //
T02D2245:135b-49: de dag ni rdo rje'i skyil krung can //
T02D2245:135b-50: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gtsug tor can skra dang kha spu bregs pa /
T02D2245:135b-52: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D2245:136a-0: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan @136a * //
T02D2245:136a-2: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi gzhir gyur ba bu ga dang /
T02D2245:136a-5: me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste /
T02D2245:136a-6: bden pa dang brdzun pa la sogs pa mtha' dag
T02D2245:136a-7: dang bral ba dri ma med pa rab tu snang
T02D2245:136a-8: ba tsam ste longs spyod rdzogs ba'i sku'o //
T02D2245:136a-9: sku gsum ro gcig pa ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
T02D2245:136a-10: 'dus byas pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid chos kyi sku'o //
T02D2245:136a-11: brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'i sku tha mi dad pa'o //
T02D2245:136a-14: 'du byed kyi phung po'i bdag nyid rnam par snang
T02D2245:136a-15: mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med
T02D2245:136a-16: dang don yod grub pa rnam par shes pa tsam
T02D2245:136a-17: du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mi bskyod pas rgyas
T02D2245:136a-19: mi bskyod pas dbu la brgyan pa'o //
T02D2245:136a-20: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med ba stong ba
T02D2245:136a-21: dang snying rje'i bdag gnyid du rtogs par bya ba'i
T02D2245:136a-22: phyir mi bskyod pa las yang rdo rje sems dpas
T02D2245:136a-24: de dag gis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid srid
T02D2245:136a-25: pa dang mya ngan las 'das par ro gcig pa
T02D2245:136a-26: tsam du 'gro ba 'di dag rtogs par 'gyur ro
T02D2245:136a-28: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02D2245:136a-29: gang las sems ni rnam bsgoms pa //
T02D2245:136a-30: de ni sangs rgyas dang ni chos //
T02D2245:136a-32: bu ram mngar zhing me tsha ba //
T02D2245:136a-33: ji bzhin pa yi rang bzhin te //
T02D2245:136a-34: chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid //
T02D2245:136a-35: de bzhin rang bzhin 'dod pa yin //
T02D2245:136a-37: srid pa dag ni yongs shes na //
T02D2245:136a-38: mya ngan 'das zhes de la brjod //
T02D2245:136a-39: me'i mtshams kyi 'dab ma la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2245:136a-40: gyi steng du lam dkar po las skyes pa'i spyan
T02D2245:136a-42: mig gi mtshan ma can sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin //
T02D2245:136a-43: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba /
T02D2245:136a-46: aom a'a:lam h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa'o //
T02D2245:136a-47: bden bral du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D2245:136a-48: mam nag po'i sa bon las yang dag par byung
T02D2245:136a-49: ba / m'a ma k'i kha dog nag mo rdo
T02D2245:136a-50: rje nag po'i mtshan ma can chu'i khams kyi rang
T02D2245:136a-51: bzhin rdo rje'i rigs zhe sdang la dga' ma'o //
T02D2245:136b-0: aom a'a:mam @136b h'um sv'a h'a zhes bya'o //
T02D2245:136b-1: rlung gi phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D2245:136b-2: du bam gyi sa bon las yang dag par byung
T02D2245:136b-3: ba / gos dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i ming
T02D2245:136b-4: can kha dog dmar po padma'i mtshan ma can me'i
T02D2245:136b-5: khams kyi rang bzhin padma'i rigs 'dod chags la dga'
T02D2245:136b-6: ba / ma'o // 'di'i sa bon dang sngags ni /
T02D2245:136b-7: aom a'a:bam h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa'o //
T02D2245:136b-8: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2245:136b-9: steng du sngo bsangs t'i yongs su gyur ba las
T02D2245:136b-10: sgrol ma kha dog sngo bsangs autpala sngon po'i mtshan
T02D2245:136b-11: ma can / rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin las kyi rigs phrag dog dga' ma'o//
T02D2245:136b-13: aom a'a:t'am h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa'o //
T02D2245:136b-14: de la lha mo bzhi ni lo bcu drug lon pa thun mong ma yin par mdzes pa /
T02D2245:136b-15: gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan pa ji ltar mdzes par yang dag par gnas pa'o //
T02D2245:136b-16: sku bzhi'i bdag nyid sngon bzhin yid du 'ong ba
T02D2245:136b-17: rgyal ba'i yon tan thams cad kyi rang bzhin du
T02D2245:136b-18: gyur pa / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin
T02D2245:136b-19: can de dag gi dbus su a'a li'i rang bzhin
T02D2245:136b-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs 'di ni rdo rje dbyings
T02D2245:136b-22: gzhung 'di byas pa'i dge ba gang phyir 'bad ba cung zad mdor bsdus slob mas rtogs bya'i phyir //
T02D2245:136b-23: cho ga 'di ni bsdus pas sems can rnams la phan pa yun ring du //
T02D2245:136b-24: rgyal ba kun gyi lung dang rigs par ldan pa'i phyir //
T02D2245:136b-25: ma lus dge ba 'di ni bdag gis thob pas
T02D2245:136b-26: 'gro ba rnams ni rgyal gyur cig /'di ni rdo
T02D2245:136b-27: rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin lnga pa dpal gnyis med
T02D2245:136b-28: rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
